channel.title: news on DAMON Project
channel.description: Recent content in news on DAMON Project

item.title: DAMON News List
item.description: Below is a list of news around DAMON project. This list is not exhaustive but just a DAMON maintainer’s collection of news. If you find a news that should be added to this list, please let us know at sj@kernel.org and/or damon@lists.linux.dev. 2024 2024-11-25: damo v2.5.7 is releasd with tempearture-based regions filtering and formatting features. Show a blog post showing the details of the fetures and examples on a server workload.
